name: 10.7 "Bar Wars V: The Final Judgement" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where do the guys go to the bathroom on Halloween?
questions.explanation:
Melville's.

	Rebecca commented that they were scared to go to the bathroom [at Cheers]. Norm said, "'We go upstairs to Melville's. It's once a year."

questions.correct: She was never allowed to get candy.
options: She was spooked as a child.
She had a bad experience with bobbing for apples.
questions.explanation:
She was never allowed to get candy.

	She said she couldn't wait to be an adult so she wouldn't have to serve other people. Norm asked her for a beer and she realized she was still serving people.

questions.text: When the gang decide they need to get Gary what did Sam want to do?
questions.explanation:
Soap his windows.

	The others were looking for something more drastic and dramatic. Gary's Olde Towne Tavern beats Cheers at almost everything.

To call off all pranks.

	Gary said he went to the doctor and had abnormally high blood pressure. He said if he didn't take it easy he could end up a lot worse.

questions.text: Did Sam believe Gary was sick?
questions.explanation:
No.

	He thought Gary was just trying to get them off their guard. Rebecca couldn't believe Sam still planned on pranking Gary.

questions.text: What did Frasier suggest they do to scare Gary?
questions.explanation:
Hologram.

	The others loved the idea. Frasier said he got the idea because Lilith and her friend pulled it on him the year before.

questions.text: Who did Frederick dress up as?
questions.explanation:
Spider-Man.

	Frasier and Lilith dressed up as well. However, nobody knew who they were supposed to be.

questions.text: When did Sam say he'd believe Gary was dead?
questions.explanation:
When they buried him.

	Everyone else was upset that Gary died. Sam however continued to believe it was another scam. Even after Gary was buried Sam still didn't believe he was dead.

No.

	He set up this elaborate scam with the help of all of Boston. Poor Sam finally started to believe Gary was gone, so when he saw Gary it really scared him.

questions.text: What clue did Carla say she gave earlier?
questions.correct: They wanted to be on the winning end of a great scam.
options: Gary was seen walking down the street.
She was in love with Gary.
Perhaps Gary wasn't so bad after all.
questions.explanation:
They wanted to be on the winning end of a great scam.

	Sam was really upset and wanted to get back at Gary. Woody gave him the fake bloody thumb and Sam started to chase Gary with it.
